trans-unit.source: Signing in to the mobile app using a verification code with Azure Multi-Factor Authentication
trans-unit.target: Signing in to the mobile app using a verification code with Azure Multi-Factor Authentication

trans-unit.source: This page will describe how a user can signin using a mobile app verification code with Azure MFA.
trans-unit.target: This page will describe how a user can signin using a mobile app verification code with Azure MFA.

trans-unit.source: Signing in to the mobile app using a verification code with Azure Multi-Factor Authentication
trans-unit.target: Signing in to the mobile app using a verification code with Azure Multi-Factor Authentication

trans-unit.source: The following information will describe the experience of using multi-factor authentication with your mobile app when you are using it with a verification code.
trans-unit.target: The following information will describe the experience of using multi-factor authentication with your mobile app when you are using it with a verification code.

trans-unit.source: To sign in using a verification code with your mobile app
trans-unit.target: To sign in using a verification code with your mobile app

trans-unit.source: Sign in to an application or service such as Office 365 using your user name and password.
trans-unit.target: Sign in to an application or service such as Office 365 using your user name and password.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft will prompt you for a verification code.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft will prompt you for a verification code.

trans-unit.source: Open the Azure Authenticatior app on your phone and enter the code in the box where you are signing in.
trans-unit.target: Open the Azure Authenticatior app on your phone and enter the code in the box where you are signing in.

trans-unit.source: You should now be signed in.
trans-unit.target: You should now be signed in.
